project.name: |-- 007-lambdas-and-method-refs-into-practice
project.description:
Keywords: + Lambdas, lambda expressions + Method References
This project includes simple examples that illustrate how to work with predicate and function composition.
PredicateCompositionLambdasRunner: Demonstrates how to use the negate, and and or convenience methods to create composed predicates from simpler ones.
FunctionCompositionLambdasRunner: Demonstrates how to use the andThen and compose methods of the Function functional interface to create pipelines and composition of functions.
